productDocument.title: LinkedIn 5 with Nov 2020 update (Ionic 5)
productDocument.headline: The latest LinkedIn UI for Ionic 5
productDocument.compatibility: If you've purchased [LinkedIn 5 (Ionic 5)](https://market.ionicframework.com/themes/ionic-linkedin-5) earlier, this is a free update for you (yes!). Please find the zip under your Gumroad purchase, or simply drop me an email and include your proof of purchase. I repeat: only applied for LinkedIn on **Ionic 5** version.
productDocument.introduction:
[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/) is a networking tool to find connections to recommended job candidates, industry experts and business partners. Its UI has been updated constantly and I really love how it looks nowadays. I've been using it for years and have [my own profile](https://linkedin.com/in/hieupv) there. 

I always take it serious to write high quality, clean and self-explained code. When purchasing this, you also get my latest "helper" snippets inside the package to make it even more fun to code.

Every app seems to add Story feature these days. So did Linkedin. I've updated the UI to the latest in Nov 2020.
productDocument.changelog:
*Last updated: Nov 29 2020*

### v1 (May 11 2020)

* First version

### v2 (Nov 29 2020)

* Update to the latest LinkedIn mobile app UI
* Add Story UI
productDocument.screens:
1. Welcome
2. Log in
3. Home (news feed)
4. Post Detail and Post comment
5. Network
6. New Post
7. Notifications
8. Jobs
9. Messaging and conversation
10. Profile
11. Search
12. Job detail
13. Story
14. Dark mode (bingo!!!) - When the whole world is going dark

template.body:

# <%= data.title %>

> <%= data.headline %>

<%= data.compatibility %>


### Payment methods

<% if (data.price == 0) { %>

<% } else { %>
Pay via **Stripe** using the button **PURCHASE  $<%= data.price %>** on the side.

Other options:

If you want to **Paypal** directly, please let me know the name of the item by sending me an email [mr_hie@yahoo.com](mailto:mr_hie@yahoo.com) **before** you process the payment. Thanks.

[![Purchase Externally](https://www.dropbox.com/s/3by6x3gbfd3v0hw/btn_paypal.png?raw=1)](https://paypal.me/mrhieu/<%= data.price %>)
<% } %>

# Introduction

<%= data.introduction %>

# Preview

<% if (data.apkUrl) { %>
**Download APK to preview the theme:** 

[![enter image description here](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/MIkXV-iIhrxPG5tZn8QTglczrISwLwebr8QmCKcJFN6NL0eNLf5GqWltrefAZwzAwh2r4RPk=w96-h96-e365)
<%= data.slug %>_demo.apk](<%= data.apkUrl %>)
<% } %>

**Watch on Youtube**

See how it works on Youtube: <%= data.youtubeUrl %>
<% if (data.youtubeUrl) { %>
<%= data.youtubeEmbedUrl %>
<% } else { %>
(coming soon)
<% } %>

**See more**

You might like my collection of Ionic products. See more at https://market.ionic.io/user/66136

[![See more of my works](https://static-2.gumroad.com/res/gumroad/9272340532322/asset_previews/e9a8450911560944ee0093e22ba3b802/retina/banner.png)](https://market.ionic.io/user/66136)

Happy prototyping!

<% if (data.trackingUrl) { %>
![enter image description here](<%= data.trackingUrl %>)
<% } %>

# Changelog

> Note: All updates are on <%= data.framework %>

<%= data.changelog %>

# Screens

<%= data.screens %>

# Run locally
1.Install Ionic environment

```
$ npm install -g @ionic/cli@6.12.0
```

2.After purchasing, download the zip file containing the entire demo app and unzip

3.Go inside the extracted folder

4.Install all dependencies 

```
$ npm install
```

5.Start local server

```
$ ionic serve
```

6.Your default browser should now automatically open the template


# Notes

<%= data.notes %>

### Build with capacitor

First of all, make sure that you can **Run Locally** (see the instruction above).

```
# build web asset (to folder www)
$ ionic build

# add platform (ios or android)
$ ionic capacitor add ios

# prepare app icons and splash images
$ npm run resources

# copy web assets into the native project
$ ionic capacitor copy ios

# open Xcode, then build the native app from there
$ ionic capacitor open ios

# OR run in live-reload mode
$ ionic capacitor run ios -l --external
```

See more: 

[Ionic - iOS Development](https://ionicframework.com/docs/building/ios)

[Ionic - Android Development](https://ionicframework.com/docs/building/android)

[Migrating a Web App Using Cordova to Capacitor](https://capacitor.ionicframework.com/docs/cordova/migrating-from-cordova-to-capacitor/)

# Contact
If you need technical support or have any questions, don't hesitate to send me a message: [mr_hie@yahoo.com](mailto:mr_hie@yahoo.com)

Homepage: [https://www.takethatdesign.com](https://www.takethatdesign.com)

[![Purchase Externally](http://bit.ly/2E4p4z3)](https://gum.co/ionicbundle4)

productDocument.title: Ionic Tinder 5 Tabbed View (Ionic 5)
productDocument.headline: Updated Tinder UI with Tabbed View
productDocument.compatibility: If you've purchased Tinder 5 (Ionic 5) earlier, this is a free update for you (yes!). Please find the zip under your Gumroad purchase, or simply drop me an email and include your proof of purchase. I repeat: only applied for Ionic 5 version.
productDocument.introduction:
It's Tinder UI again with Tabbed View. I saw Tinder doing A/B Testing for their new Tabbed View layout since last year and I made Tinder UI 2020 (Tinder 4) back then. They seem to make it official now (Oct 2020) and I think "Let's make an Ionic 5 version out of it!"

> I'm an UI/UX lover. I see nice UI, I clone. That's all!

I always take it serious to keep the code quality high, with clean and self-explained code.
productDocument.changelog:
*Last updated: Oct 19, 2020*

### v1 (May 5, 2020)
* First version

### v2 (May 26, 2020)
* Significantly improve the performance on older Android devices
* Fix status bar color on Android
* Some UI bug fixes

### v3 (Oct 19, 2020)
* Update Tinder UI (Oct 2020) with tabbed view
* Add Passions edit page
* Some bug fixes and improvements
productDocument.screens:
1. Welcome
2. Explore (Swiping)
3. Matched
4. Me
5. Settings
6. Profile
7. Profile Edit
8. Passions Edit
9. Top picks - Likes
10. Messaging
11. Feed 
12. Chat (including Giphy keyboard)
13. Dark mode switch

Never seen Tinder in Dark mode? This is it!

productDocument.title: Twitter 5 (Ionic 5)
productDocument.headline: Social Network
productDocument.introduction:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/) is a very popular social networking that needs no introduction. I myself (@mrhieu) use Twitter everyday and learned a lot from the links being shared between the tweets.

I always take it serious to keep the code quality high with clean and self-explained code. When purchasing this, you also get my latest "helper" snippets inside the package to make it more fun to code.
productDocument.screens:
1. Welcome
2. Login
3. News Feed (Home)
4. Post Detail
5. New Tweet
6. Fullscreen photo viewer
7. Search (Trends, Search Results, Search Options)
8. Notifications
9. Messages
10. Chat UI
11. My Profile
12. Settings

And **Dark Mode** for all screens!

BTW this is the component I like the most in My Profile page:
![header](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1593560/92328756-83305e80-f095-11ea-8722-b5306208add8.gif)

productDocument.title: Pinterest 5 (Ionic 5)
productDocument.headline: Photo Sharing Network
productDocument.compatibility: Use the code **NEW20** to get 20% discount. Applied for the first 3 buyers only.
productDocument.introduction:
[Pinterest](http://www.pinterest.com/) is a visual discovery tool that you can use to find ideas for all your projects and interests. Pinterest has always been my top favorite app when it comes to UI/UX design. That might be a big part of their successful IPO at $12.7bn in April 2019.

I always take it serious to keep the code quality high, with clean and self-explained code. When purchasing this, you also get my latest "helper" snippets inside the package to make it more fun to code.
productDocument.screens:
1. Welcome/Login
2. Home tab - Masonry grid view
3. Pin detail
4. Search tab
5. Notification tab: updates and chats
6. My Profile
7. Public Profile
8. Settings
9. Create a Pin
10. Create a Board

And Dark Mode for all screens!
